description: List Teletrac Navman vehicles with filtering and pagination.
permissions: Admin users can list all Teletrac Navman vehicles; non-admin users can list only vehicles for brokers where they are members (scope limited to broker membership).
validation_notes: Date-time filters require non-empty ISO 8601 timestamps; boolean filters require strict true/false values.

flags.name: --has-trailer
flags.description: Filter by trailer assignment (true/false). Example: --has-trailer true.

flags.name: --assigned-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.

flags.name: --trailer-set-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum trailer set timestamp (ISO 8601).
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.

flags.name: --trailer-set-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum trailer set timestamp (ISO 8601).
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.

flags.name: --is-trailer-set-at
flags.description: Filter by has trailer set timestamp (true/false).

flags.name: --tractor-set-at-min
flags.description: Filter by minimum tractor set timestamp (ISO 8601).
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.

flags.name: --tractor-set-at-max
flags.description: Filter by maximum tractor set timestamp (ISO 8601).
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.

flags.name: --is-tractor-set-at
flags.description: Filter by has tractor set timestamp (true/false).

flags.name: --created-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.

flags.name: --created-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.

flags.name: --updated-at-min
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.

flags.name: --updated-at-max
flags.validation: Must be a non-empty ISO 8601 timestamp.
